name: lui
description: Native cross-platform GUI library for Node.js with OpenGL rendering

scripts.rebuild: cd ../.. && cmake -B build-node -G Ninja -DLUI_BUILD_TESTS=OFF -DLUI_BUILD_DEMO=OFF -DLUI_NODE=ON && ninja -C build-node src/liblui-0.0.a && mkdir -p build-node/lib && cp build-node/src/liblui-0.0.a build-node/lib/ && cd bindings/node && node-gyp rebuild

author: Michael Fisher <mfisher@lvtk.org>
